name: Monster Summoner
description:
The human who can capture and summon the elves in the magic capsule is called the elf summoner.In the game, you will play the role of an elf summoner and have 6 magic capsules that can capture any elf.The elves captured will be your companions, and you will take your companions to fight and take risks.Get stronger and stronger,catch more elves!Now,take your elves and go on an adventure!

Game features
1.There are a wide variety of elves in the game, and the summoner can capture the elves he likes.
2.With unique fighting methods and skills, the summoner can summon all his elves at one time to launch the strongest attack on the enemy!
